scripts.deploy: lessc assets/style.less assets/style.css ; git add .; git commit -m 'Deploy app'; git push origin master; git push heroku master;
scripts.deploy-gh: lessc assets/style.less assets/style.css ; git add .; git commit -m 'Deploy app'; git pull origin master; git push origin gh-pages;
scripts.deploy-master: lessc assets/style.less assets/style.css; git add .; git commit -m 'Deploy app'; git pull origin gh-pages; git push origin master
